parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of the configuration names for this component; valid only if Config_opt is set to swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration

title: IComponent2.GetVisibility
description: Gets the visibility state for this component.
signature:
System.Object GetVisibility( 
   System.Int32
Config_opt
,
   System.Object
Config_names
)

parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of the configuration names for this component; valid only if Config_opt is set to swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration

returns: Array of the visibility states for this component
